data.title: Charlie Bigham's Moussaka
data.description: Slow-cooked lamb ragù with tomato and mint, layered with potatoes, roasted aubergines and creamy béchamel sauce.

ingredients.name: Charlie Bigham's Moussaka for 2
ingredients.label: Charlie Bigham's Moussaka for 2
ingredients.sub_ingredients: lamb (20%), milk, potatoes, aubergine (8%), tomatoes, cream (milk), water, onions, passata, rapeseed oil, butter (milk), fortified wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), white wine, Cheddar cheese (milk), tomato purée, pasteurised free- range egg yolk, garlic purée, parsley, lamb stock (lamb extract, water, yeast extract, sugar, cornflour, onion concentrate, salt, rosemary oil, thyme oil), cornflour, breadcrumbs (fortified wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), salt, yeast, colours (colour caramel and colour paprika extract), sugar, sunflower oil, turmeric extract), Regato cheese (milk), salt, oregano, thyme, ground coriander, black pepper, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, ground cayenne pepper, ground pimento, ground bay leaf, dried mint.

data.title: Pulled Hoisin Chicken & Sesame Noodles
data.description: In this quick, simple dish, you'll smother tender pulled chicken thighs with sweet, fiery hoisin sauce, and serve on wholewheat sesame noodles with garlicky greens. Hao chi (delicious)!

ingredients.name: 2 wholewheat noodle nests
ingredients.label: 2 wholewheat noodle nests
ingredients.sub_ingredients: wholemeal flour (gluten) (47%), wheat flour (wheat flour (gluten), calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), salt, firming agent: (potassium carbonate, sodium carbonate)

ingredients.name: 1 hoisin sauce sachet (40g)
ingredients.label: 1 hoisin sauce sachet (40g)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: water, sugar, white miso paste (soya), cornflour, garlic puree, caramelised sugar syrup, 5 spice, rice vinegar, chilli puree, yeast extract , salt, citric acid

ingredients.name: 1 soy sauce sachet (30ml)
ingredients.label: 1 soy sauce sachet (30ml)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: water, soy bean, wheat (gluten), salt, alcohol (ethanol)

data.title: 10-Min Pesto Chicken Caprese Salad With Croutons
data.description: For this speedy salad, you'll toss mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, ciabatta croutons and seared pesto chicken in a quick balsamic vinaigrette. Sizzle, toss, done!

ingredients.name: 1 mozzarella ball (125g)
ingredients.label: 1 mozzarella ball (125g)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: pasteurised cows milk, salt, microbial rennet, citric acid

ingredients.name: 1 classic nut pesto pot (45g)
ingredients.label: 1 classic nut pesto pot (45g)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: sunflower seed oil, italian basil (36%), cashew (nut), grana padano pdo cheese (milk, rennet, salt, preservative: lysozyme from egg (e1105), glucose, pecorino romano pdo cheese (milk, salt, rennet), sea salt, crushed pine kernels, extra virgin olive oil, whey protein (milk), flavourings, potato flakes, spices, antioxidant: rosemary extract; acidity regulator: lactic acid

ingredients.name: 1 balsamic vinegar sachet (15ml)
ingredients.label: 1 balsamic vinegar sachet (15ml)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: wine vinegar, concentrated grape must, potassium metabisulphite (sulphites)

ingredients.name: 1 ciabatta roll
ingredients.label: 1 ciabatta roll
ingredients.sub_ingredients: fortified wheat flour [wheat flour, calcium carbonate, niacin (b3), iron, thiamin (b1)], water, extra virgin olive oil (3%), yeast, salt, wheat flour, rapeseed oil, spirit vinegar, wheat gluten, sugar, fermented wheat flour, soya flour, malted wheat flour, flour treatment agent (ascorbic acid)

data.title: Sweet Chilli Jumbo Prawn Cali-Style Sushi Bowl
data.description: "Have a taste of this! This bowl's full a' juicy jumbo prawns, brown rice, pickled radishes, creamy avo and carrot ribbons – and it tastes as good as it looks! Finish off with a drizzle of zingy ginger and lime dressing."
